00030   namespace {
00031     const double default_unit_cell_angle = 90.0;   // This should make VMD happy...
00032   };

00036   void DCDWriter::writeF77Line(const char* const data, const unsigned int len) {
00037     DataOverlay d;
00038 
00039     d.ui = len;
00040 
00041     _stream->write((char *)&d, sizeof(len));
00042     _stream->write(data, len);
00043     _stream->write((char *)&d, sizeof(len));
00044   }
00045 
00046 
00047   std::string DCDWriter::fixStringSize(const std::string& s, const unsigned int n) {
00048     std::string result(s);
00049 
00050     if (s.size() < n) {
00051       int i = n - s.size();
00052       result += std::string (i, ' ');
00053     } else if (s.size() > n)
00054       result = s.substr(0, n);
00055 
00056     return(result);
00057   }
00058 
00059 
00060   void DCDWriter::writeHeader(void) {
00061     unsigned int icntrl[21];
00062     DataOverlay *dop = (DataOverlay *)(&icntrl[0]);
00063     unsigned int i;
00064     for (i=0; i<21; i++)
00065       icntrl[i] = 0;
00066 
00067     icntrl[1] = _nsteps;
00068     icntrl[2] = 1;
00069     icntrl[3] = 1;
00070     icntrl[4] = _nsteps;
00071     icntrl[8] = _natoms * 3 - 6;
00072     icntrl[9] = 0;
00073     dop[10].f = _timestep;
00074     icntrl[11] = _has_box;
00075     icntrl[20] = 27;
00076     dop[0].c[0] = 'C'; dop[0].c[1] = 'O'; dop[0].c[2] = 'R'; dop[0].c[3] = 'D';
00077 
00078     writeF77Line((char *)dop, 21 * sizeof(unsigned int));
00079 
00080     unsigned int size = 4 + 80 * _titles.size();
00081     char *ptr = new char[size];
00082     unsigned int *iptr = (unsigned int *)ptr;
00083     *iptr = _titles.size();
00084     for (i=0; i<_titles.size(); i++) {
00085       std::string s = fixStringSize(_titles[i], 80);
00086       memcpy(ptr + sizeof(unsigned int) + 80*i, s.c_str(), 80);
00087     }
00088     writeF77Line(ptr, size);
00089     delete[] ptr;
00090   
00091 
00092     dop[0].ui = _natoms;
00093     writeF77Line((char *)dop, 1 * sizeof(unsigned int));
00094 
00095     _header_written = true;
00096   }
00097

00100   void DCDWriter::writeBox(const GCoord& box) {
00101     double xtal[6] = { box[0], default_unit_cell_angle, box[1],
00102                        default_unit_cell_angle, default_unit_cell_angle, box[2] };
00103 
00104     writeF77Line((char *)xtal, 6*sizeof(double));
00105   }

00108 
00109   void DCDWriter::writeFrame(const AtomicGroup& grp) {
00110 
00111     if (_natoms == 0) {   // Assume this is the first frame being written...
00112       _natoms = grp.size();
00113       _has_box = grp.isPeriodic();
00114 
00115     } else {
00116 
00117       if (grp.size() != _natoms)
00118         throw(std::runtime_error("Frame group atom count mismatch"));
00119 
00120       if (_has_box && !grp.isPeriodic())
00121         throw(std::runtime_error("Periodic box data was requested for the DCD but the passed frame is missing it"));
00122 
00123     }
00124 
00125     if (_current >= _nsteps) {
00126       _stream->seekp(0);
00127       ++_nsteps;
00128       writeHeader();
00129       _stream->seekp(0, std::ios_base::end);
00130       if (_stream->fail())
00131         throw(std::runtime_error("Error while re-writing DCD header"));
00132     }
00133 
00134     if (_has_box)
00135       writeBox(grp.periodicBox());
00136 
00137     float *data = new float[_natoms];
00138     int i;
00139     for (i=0; i<_natoms; i++)
00140       data[i] = grp[i]->coords().x();
00141     writeF77Line((char *)data, _natoms * sizeof(float));
00142 
00143     for (i=0; i<_natoms; i++)
00144       data[i] = grp[i]->coords().y();
00145     writeF77Line((char *)data, _natoms * sizeof(float));
00146 
00147     for (i=0; i<_natoms; i++)
00148       data[i] = grp[i]->coords().z();
00149     writeF77Line((char *)data, _natoms * sizeof(float));
00150 
00151     delete[] data;
00152 
00153     _stream->flush();
00154     ++_current;
00155   }
00156 
00157 
00158   void DCDWriter::writeFrame(const std::vector<AtomicGroup>& grps) {
00159     std::vector<AtomicGroup>::const_iterator i;
00160 
00161     for (i= grps.begin(); i != grps.end(); i++)
00162       writeFrame(*i);
00163   }
00164 
00165   void DCDWriter::readExistingHeader(const std::string& fname) {
00166 
00167     DCD dcd(fname);
00168     _natoms = dcd.natoms();
00169     _has_box = dcd.hasPeriodicBox();
00170     _timestep = dcd.timestep();
00171     _current = _nsteps = dcd.nframes();
00172     _titles = dcd.titles();
00173   }
00174 
00175 }
